item.title: Version 1.1.17
item.description: The application now fully supports devices with a 16KB memory page size, ensuring improved performance and stability on a broader range of hardware

item.title: Version 1.1.16
item.description:
Whatâ€™s New in v1.1.16+43 New Features 1.Commitment now shown directly in Deal Cards. 2.Deal Cards display current status. 3.New filter: sort deals by status. 4.Financial Overview shows only this year (Receivable/Payable). 5.Operator search includes PMN Code. 6.Alliance Name shown in Deal Cards.
Fixes & Improvements 1.Faster, more accurate search with partial match support. 2.Fixed layout issues on Samsung S23/S24/S25. 3.Search reset works properly. 4.Corrected Net Position values on Global Map.
